name: com.coimbra.stronglytypedstrings
author: Bruno Coimbra
description:
Tool to generate strongly typed strings.

By default it can generate the following strong types:

* Inputs
* Layers
* Scenes
* Sorting Layers
* Tags
* Editor Default Resources
* Gizmos
* Resources
* Streaming Assets

You can easily add more using the provided API.

samples.description: A simple example of how to create new custom strongly-typed strings for your own use case.
